Record.ClassificationPath: Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Pharmacologic Substance/Antineoplastic Agent/LY573636
Record.BroaderTerm: Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Description: A sulfonamide compound with potential antiproliferative activity. LY573636 may have mechanisms of action similar to those of other sulfonamide derivatives. In combination with an angiogenesis inhibitor, LY573636 may exert potentially synergistic antiangiogenic effects, resulting in inhibition of tumor angiogenesis and tumor cell proliferation.
